job_tasks.phrase: generatieve AI services implementeren binnen Mendix apps
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the act of integrating generative AI functionalities into existing applications (Mendix apps), which falls under software development and deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Samen met datascientists sleutelen aan vernieuwende ML modellen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to working on and refining machine learning models, which is the core of the 'Modeling' task category.

job_tasks.phrase: Nieuwe mogelijkheden van AI verkennen en samen met klanten slimme oplossingen ontwikkelen
job_tasks.justification: This indicates understanding client needs and exploring AI possibilities to develop solutions, aligning with business understanding and translating needs into technical solutions.

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes implementing generative AI services and collaborating on ML models. It also highlights exploring AI possibilities and developing solutions with clients, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on language, vision, and interaction.
